tool_description: Access GPT-3, which performs a variety of natural language tasks, Codex, which translates natural language to code, and DALL·E, which creates and edits original images.
name: Open Ai
title: Open Ai

api_list.name: Playground
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://open-ai1.p.rapidapi.com/chat/completions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "open-ai1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
